title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Rural and Community Development) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister rural community development) order 2023

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Niall O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Niall O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Rural and Community Development, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Rural and Community 
Development with effect from 17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

14 February, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [69] 3
